full_summary:
# **Government Tender Announcement: Septic System Replacement**
## Details
* **Reference**: cb-8592-41039753
* **Solicitation**: 5P468-23-0162/A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-08-29
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-14T14:00:00

## Project Description
Parks Canada Agency invites qualified bidders to submit a proposal for the replacement of septic systems at two locations:
* 4715 York Durham Line, Pickering, Ontario
* 9992 York Durham Line, Markham, Ontario

The work entails:
* Accessing the site
* Decommissioning the old septic system and associated parts with reasonable efforts
* Installing a new concrete tank and leaching field
* Returning the septic system to a fully functional state

## Important Details
* This project is estimated to be valued between $100,001 and $250,000, including taxes.
* The Vendor must complete the work by October 31, 2023.
* An optional site visit will be held on September 6, 2023 at 9:00 AM EDT (HAQ).
* Bidders who fail to attend or provide a representative may be precluded from submitting a late bid.
* All inquiries must be submitted in writing and received five business days prior to the tender closing date.
* Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

## Tendering Requirements
* Bids must be submitted via fax or email to [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:souissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca).
* Fax.btnSaveSingle: 1-855-983-1808.
* Email attachments must not exceed 15 megabytes.
* Bidders must confirm attendance to the optional site visit at least 48 hours in advance.

## Contracting Requirements
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Suppliers must comply with the National Parks Regulations.
* Late submissions will not be considered.

Please refer to the appendices for all documentation associated with this tender opportunity: [PDF documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8592/5p468-23-0162-itt-en.pdf) and [Appendices](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8592/appendix-a---5p468
